Ranger.Prerequisites: Dexterity score and a Wisdom score of 13 or higher required to multiclass in or out of this class.

Hit Points.Hit Points at Higher Levels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per ranger level after 1st

Equipment: (a) two shortswords or (b) two simple melee weapons
(a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack
A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows

Favored Enemy.Description: Significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and talking to a certain type of enemy.
Benefits: Advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track favored enemies
Advantage on Intelligence checks to recall information about favored enemies
Learn one language spoken by favored enemies

Favored Foe (Optional).Description: Replaces Favored Enemy. Allows you to mark a target as your favored enemy for extra damage.
Benefits: Extra damage of 1d4 on attacks against marked favored enemy (increases to 1d6 at 6th level and 1d8 at 14th level)
Number of marks equal to proficiency bonus, regains uses after long rest

Natural Explorer.Description: Familiarity with a type of natural environment, enhances traveling and survival.
Benefits: Group can't become lost except by magical means
Remain alert to danger while traveling
Move stealthily at normal pace when traveling alone
Find twice as much food when foraging
Learn exact number, sizes, and passage time of tracked creatures

Deft Explorer (Optional).Description: Replaces Natural Explorer. Provides enhanced exploration and survival abilities.
Benefits: Canny: Doubled proficiency bonus for chosen skill, speak/read/write 2 additional languages
Roving (6th Level): Increased walking speed, climbing speed, and swimming speed
Tireless (10th Level): Temporary hit points as an action, decrease exhaustion level after short rest

Options: Archery: +2 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons
Defense: +1 bonus to AC while wearing armor
Druidic Warrior: Learn 2 cantrips from Druid spell list, replace cantrips on level up
Dueling: +2 bonus to damage rolls with one-handed melee weapon
Thrown Weapon Fighting: +2 bonus to damage rolls with thrown weapon
Two-Weapon Fighting: Add ability modifier to damage of second attack
Close Quarters Shooter (UA): Ranged attacks within 5 feet, ignore cover, +1 to attack rolls
Interception (UA): Reduce damage of attacks within 5 feet, requires shield or weapon
Mariner (UA): Swimming and climbing speed, +1 bonus to armor class
Tunnel Fighter (UA): Defensive stance for opportunity attacks and melee attacks on movement
Unarmed Fighting (UA): Unarmed strikes deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, increase to 1d8 with two free hands

Spellcasting.Description: Learn to use magical essence of nature to cast spells.
Spellcasting.Spells Known: Start with two 1st-level spells, learn more as you level up.

Spellcasting Focus (Optional).Description: Use a druidic focus as a spellcasting focus for ranger spells.

Primeval Awareness.Description: Sense presence of certain creature types within 1 mile (or 6 miles in favored terrain) by expending a spell slot.

Primal Awareness (Optional).Description: Replaces Primeval Awareness. Learn additional spells as you level up.

Ability Score Improvement.Description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1 at specific levels.

Martial Versatility (Optional).Description: Replace a fighting style known with another fighting style available to rangers.

Extra Attack.Description: Attack twice instead of once when taking the Attack action.

Land's Stride.Description: Move through nonmagical difficult terrain without extra movement, pass through nonmagical plants, advantage on saving throws against magical plants.

Hide in Plain Sight.Description: Create camouflage for yourself to gain +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Nature's Veil (Optional).Description: Become invisible as a bonus action until the start of your next turn.

Vanish.Description: Use Hide action as a bonus action, can't be tracked by nonmagical means unless you choose to leave a trail.

Feral Senses.Description: Attack creatures you can't see without disadvantage, aware of location of invisible creatures within 30 feet.

Foe Slayer.Description: Add Wisdom modifier to attack or damage roll against favored enemies once per turn.
